name: Add New Training Content to Your Library
title: Add New Training Content to Your Library
body:
We constantly add and update ModStore content to help keep your users informed about important security topics. To run a training campaign that includes the newest content, you will need to add the training content to your library.

To add this new content to your library, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your KSAT console and navigate to the ModStore tab.
  2. Open the Additional Filters menu by clicking on the plus sign under the Search box.
  3. From the Subscription Levels drop-down menu, select My Subscriptions. When you apply this filter, you will only see content that is available for your subscription level.
  4. From the Sort By drop-down menu, select Most Recent to view the newest content releases.
  5. To learn more about a piece of content, you can click the card or click the View Details button.
  6. To add content to your library, click the + Add to Library button on the content’s card or Item Details page.

Once added, the piece of content will be listed on the Library subtab and can be included in training campaigns.

For more information about training content, see our ModStore and Library Guide. To learn how to create a campaign with new ModStore content, see our Creating and Managing Training Campaigns guide.

images.alt:
This image captures a web application interface segment, specifically demonstrating filtering controls and a content results grid.

**UI Elements and Controls:**

*   **Action Buttons:** Located in the upper right, two distinct controls are visible: "Download Results" and "Clear Filters."
*   **Sort Control (Dropdown Menu):** A sorting selector is active and open. The header displays "Most Recent Please selec" (partially truncated).
    *   The visible sort options in the dropdown list are:
        1.  Most Popular
        2.  Most Recent (Currently selected, highlighted in dark gray)
        3.  Duration

**Content Grid (Tiles):**

The interface displays a horizontal array of content tiles or cards representing resources.

*   **Indicator Tags:** Three of the four visible tiles feature an orange "New" indicator tag in the top-left corner.
*   **Tile 2 (Cartoon Gazelle):** Features a dark green footer bar containing two icons: an academic/graduation cap (instructional content indicator) and a multi-dotted video playback icon.
*   **Tile 3 and 4 (Photographic):** Both tiles feature a prominent dark blue circular overlay icon containing a white outline of a laptop topped with a shield enclosing a checkmark (indicating security or verified content).
images.context: op-down menu, select Most Recent to view the newest content releases.

images.alt:
The image displays the product detail page for a training module titled **"Anti-Bribery and Corruption."**

**Contextual and Text Elements:**

*   **Module Identification:** Listed under the heading "Training Module" (orange text).
*   **Metadata:** Key specifications are provided: "10 minutes" (duration icon), "Training Module" (type icon), and "December 2023" (date icon).
*   **Feature Tags (Badges):** Three capability badges are displayed in orange/yellow hues: "Brandable Content," "Compliance Plus," and "1 Language."
*   **Description:** A truncated description begins, followed by the provider credit: "By Popcorn Training."

**Visual and UI Interaction Elements:**

*   **Thumbnail:** A large graphic on the left depicts a blue whistle, serving as the module's cover image. A blue footer bar contains two small icons, symbolizing academic content and video content.
*   **Action Buttons (User Interface):** A stack of three action buttons is presented below the thumbnail:
    1.  Primary blue button: **"View"** (with a dropdown indicator).
    2.  Secondary green button: **"+ Add to Library"** (This button is highlighted by a prominent orange arrow, indicating a suggested action).
    3.  Tertiary white button: **"Download."**
*   **Links:** A link below the buttons provides access to **"Open in Content Manager"** (includes an external link icon).
*   **Content Preview:** The lower right section shows a cropped preview of the module content, featuring a stylized cartoon business character and two navigation arrows (`<`, `>`) for browsing preview frames.
images.context: y button on the content’s card or Item Details page.

images.alt:
The image displays the "Library" screen within the ModStore application interface, used for managing content assets.

**Header and Navigation:**
The primary navigation bar contains five tabs: "Browse," "Library" (currently active, indicated by an underline), "Brandable Content," "Content Manager," and "Uploaded Content."

**Filtering and Search Controls:**
Below the main title "Library," a filtering section is present:
1.  **Content Types:** A dropdown selector, currently set to "All."
2.  **Search:** An input field with the placeholder "Search" and an adjacent search icon.
3.  **Clear Filters:** A button to reset filter criteria.
4.  **Show Hidden Items:** A toggle switch, currently in the OFF/inactive state.

**Data Table:**
The main area is a table listing content assets with six primary column headers. The "Content Title," "Date Added," and "Duration" columns feature sorting indicators (up/down carets).

**Table Columns and Sample Data:**

| Column Header | Sample Data (Row 1) | UI Elements Noted |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Content Title** | Ethics and Code of Conduct: Handling Company Resources | Titles are presented as blue hyperlinks. |
| **(Implied Edit)** | N/A | A pencil icon precedes some Content Types, indicating an edit action. |
| **Content Type** | Training Module | Values include Training Module, Video Module, and Mobile-First Module. |
| **Status** | Published | All visible items are marked "Published." |
| **Date Added** | 01/25/2024 | Standard date format. |
| **Duration** | 15 minutes | Time displayed in minutes. |
| **Actions** | Info (i), Preview (List Icon), More (Vertical Ellipsis) | Includes granular action buttons such as Info ('i'), Delete (Red Trashcan), Preview/List, Visibility Toggle (Eye Icon), and More Options (Vertical Ellipsis). |

**Note on Row Variation:** The action buttons vary per row (e.g., Row 1 shows Preview and More Options, while Row 2 shows Delete and a Visibility Toggle).
images.context: listed on the Library subtab and can be included in training campaigns.
